statements: SELECT * FROM credit_card_transactions;
SELECT transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM credit_card_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, card_number, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM credit_card_transactions WHERE card_number = 123456;
SELECT * FROM credit_card_transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT card_number, transaction_amount FROM credit_card_transactions ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM credit_card_transactions LIMIT 10;
SELECT transaction_id, card_number, transaction_amount FROM credit_card_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM credit_card_transactions WHERE card_number IN (1234, 5678, 9101);
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date FROM credit_card_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(transaction_amount) AS average_amount FROM credit_card_transactions;
SELECT * FROM credit_card_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT transaction_id, card_number, transaction_amount FROM credit_card_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, merchant_name, transaction_date FROM credit_card_transactions WHERE merchant_name = 'Amazon';
SELECT * FROM credit_card_transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM fraud_detection_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM credit_card_transactions WHERE card_number = '1234567890123456' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM credit_card_transactions WHERE transaction_date > '2021-01-01' AND transaction_amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;

SELECT cc.transaction_id, cc.transaction_amount, fd.suspect_reason FROM credit_card_transactions cc JOIN fraud_detection_logs fd ON cc.transaction_id = fd.transaction_id WHERE cc.transaction_amount > 500 ORDER BY cc.transaction_amount ASC, fd.log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT cc.card_number, SUM(cc.transaction_amount) AS total_spent FROM credit_card_transactions cc GROUP BY cc.card_number HAVING total_spent > 1000 ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT cc.merchant_name, COUNT(*) AS transaction_count FROM credit_card_transactions cc GROUP BY cc.merchant_name HAVING transaction_count > 5 ORDER BY transaction_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM credit_card_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, merchant FROM credit_card_transactions WHERE is_fraud = true;
SELECT cardholder_id, name, address FROM cardholders ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE fraud_likelihood > 0.5;
SELECT card_number, amount, transaction_date FROM credit_card_transactions ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, card_number, amount, transaction_date, merchant FROM credit_card_transactions WHERE is_fraud = TRUE;
SELECT name, address, phone_number, email FROM cardholders WHERE cardholder_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT * FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE is_resolved = FALSE ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM credit_card_transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT card_number, amount, merchant, is_fraud FROM credit_card_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 AND merchant LIKE '%shop%';
SELECT * FROM credit_cards;
SELECT card_holder_name, expiration_date FROM credit_cards ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT card_number, cvv FROM credit_cards WHERE expiration_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT merchant_name, merchant_location FROM merchants WHERE merchant_location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM credit_cards WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT card_holder_name, expiration_date FROM credit_cards ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT merchant_name, merchant_location FROM merchants WHERE merchant_location LIKE '%New York%';
SELECT alert_id, alert_description, alert_date FROM fraud_alerts ORDER BY alert_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM credit_cards;
SELECT cardholder_name, expiration_date FROM credit_cards WHERE card_limit > 5000;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, merchant_name FROM transactions WHERE amount >= 100.00 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT cardholder_name, card_limit FROM credit_cards WHERE expiration_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT transaction_id, amount, status FROM transaction_history WHERE status = 'approved' ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM credit_cards ORDER BY card_number DESC;
SELECT cardholder_name, expiration_date FROM credit_cards WHERE card_limit > 5000;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, merchant_name FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100 AND merchant_name LIKE '%Amazon%';
SELECT SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY card_number HAVING total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT card_number, COUNT(*) AS transaction_count FROM transaction_history GROUP BY card_number ORDER BY transaction_count DESC LIMIT 5;
